description:
Kamba is attempting to change everything in order to save Himari, however Shouma believes that Kamba`s plans will not save her. The train that will determine their fate has left the station, leaving the two of them to confront each other.
Ringo manages to join them on the train, and she plans to use the spell that Momoka left in her diary in order to save Himari. She knows that if she uses the spell she will pay the price, but even so, she is willing to do whatever it takes to save Himari...
Source: Official Site
